MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to repair faulty electrical equipment near to Craichmore and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20am on Thursday 22nd April 2021
